creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: colorful images of figures inside shrine buildings, with one vignette of men with swords surrounding a man in black on his stomach; later images of mourners, and figures meeting; alternating with text
medium: Ink printed on paper with hand-applied color
title: Illustrations of the Life and Deeds of the Grand Master of Mount Kōya, vol. 3
